name: Meow - Find 5 Differences Game
description:
Fun fact : scientist have discovered that a cat’s eye is seven times more sensible than a human’s and that’s why cats can see way more little details than us and even see in the dark.

We have prepared for you a free puzzle game that will make you manifest your “cat” powers.

Meow differences is a game where you’ll have to look for differences between two seemingly alike pictures. Not only will our game help you develop a new sense of observation, similar to the one your beloved pet has, but it’ll also improve your attention and concentration. You can play the free puzzle game Meow differences anytime and anywhere, just find 5 differences on the beautiful pictures of incredible landscapes and cute animals!

Game features:
• Find differences on more than 1000 levels
• A bare minimum amount of publicity that won’t waste your time
• A huge amount of high definition images
• Hints that you can get when you’re stuck
• A pleasant interface that you’ll definitely like
• This game was created to be loved by children and adults. The whole family can play!

How many differences can YOU find?

It’s time to download the game Meow differences and relax playing this intriguing visual puzzle game.
